branchCategory.name: Tubing
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC manufactures Fluoro-resin tubing for use in environments involving high temperatures and/or corrosive fluids. Pneumatic tubing is also available in a number of other materials both with and without &nbsp;reinforcement for use in standard applications. SMC fittings incorporate a positive tube seal while the fitting is under pressure which allows polyurethane tubing to be used.</p> <p>Tubing is available in sizes of 1/8", 5/32", 3/16", 1/4", 5/16", 3/8", and 1/2". Metric tubing sizes of 3.2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 16mm are available.</p>

branchItem.name: Polyurethane Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's series&nbsp;of polyurethane tubing is manufactured from Polyether&nbsp;resin, insuring the longest possible tube life due to its immunity to hydrolysis. Series TIUB inch size tubing is available in 8 "quick ship" colors, in standard stocked lengths of 66ft, 100ft, 500ft, 1000ft and 1640ft.&nbsp;&nbsp;There are&nbsp;21 additional standard colors to suit special needs.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: Nylon Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>Metric and inch size nylon tubing, series for general air is available as standard in black or white, 20 meter rolls. Additional colors and roll sizes are available upon request.</p>

branchItem.name: Spark Resistant Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>Flame resistance double layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from spot welders, etc., may be a problem. The double layer design uses a flame resistant resin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer layer.</p>

branchItem.name: Fluororesin Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>High purity fluoropolymer tubing is available as standard in metric and inch sizes.&nbsp;These series has outstanding corrosion resistance, compatible with chemicals such as acids, bases and ultrapure water.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: Polyolefin Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>The clean tubing series consists of a polyolefin tubing (TPH), and a soft poly-olefin tubing (TPS). Both are available in six different colors and available in 20m or 100m bundles.</p>

branchItem.name: Wear Resistant Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>Wear resistant&nbsp;tubing series was designed to reduce sliding motion abrasion. This special polyurethane material is very similar to that of regular polyurethane and still maintains a small bending radius. Piping labor hours can be reduced with the TUZ's ability to fit into narrow piping spaces.</p>

branchItem.name: Moisture Control Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's IDK series is a moisture control tube.&nbsp; Condensation in a pneumatic system will cause operating failure and affect the life of&nbsp;pneumatic equipment.&nbsp; The IDK prevents condensation in small cylinders, air grippers, and air operated valves by diffusing water vapor in the piping to the outside before it is condensed.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: Polyethylene Tubing
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's PEAPP series of polyethylene tubing is manufactured from linear low density resin for excellent environmental stress crack resistance.&nbsp; This economical, lightweight material has excellent chemical resistance.&nbsp; It is available in six primary colors and lengths of 100, 250, 500 and 1,000 ft. depending on size.</p>
